original_text: For by grace you have been saved through faith. And this is not your own doing; it is the gift of God,
korean_text: 너희는 그 은혜에 의하여 믿음으로 말미암아 구원을 받았으니 이것은 너희에게서 난 것이 아니요 하나님의 선물이라

sentences.original_text: For by grace you have been saved through faith.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 믿음으로 말미암아 은혜로 구원을 받았으니

sentences.original_text: And this is not your own doing
it is the gift of God,
